scripts.start: concurrently "cd matico_components && yarn start" "cd editor && yarn start"
scripts.dev-editor: concurrently "cd matico_components && yarn build-dev" "cd editor && yarn start"
scripts.build: (cd matico_spec && pnpm build) && npx nx  build-prod @maticoapp/matico_charts && npx nx  build-prod &@maticoapp/matico_components&  npx nx build matico_app_server
scripts.deploy: yarn predeploy && yarn run netlify deploy --prod
